key_risks: Financial performance concerns with significant losses post-IPO
Supply chain and scaling issues leading to product shortages
Intense competition in the plant-based dairy market
Regulatory and legal scrutiny over marketing claims
controversies: Controversial investor backing from Blackstone Group, leading to accusations of greenwashing
Legal challenges and regulatory scrutiny over sustainability and health benefit claims
environmental_issues: Alleged ties of Blackstone Group to deforestation and environmental harm
social_issues: Potential damage to brand reputation among sustainability-focused consumers
governance_issues: Mixed analyst views on valuation and skepticism about near-term growth
